data.title: Your Venue for Fun Company Parties & Corporate Events in Carlsbad, CA
data.meta_description: Book Your Corporate Event or Company Party At This Fun Venue in Carlsbad, CA! Private Meeting Rooms, Full Catering, Indoor Go Kart Racing
data.text:
Need a fun and exciting event venue in the Carlsbad – Escondido – Encinitas area for your next company party or corporate event? For nearly 20 years, companies large and small have loved hosting their events at K1 Speed Carlsbad thanks to its unique adrenaline-pumping experience, private meeting rooms and professional catering.

Read on and learn more about company events at K1 Speed Carlsbad!

Give your team the exciting freedom of an open track and no speed limits. Experience a unique company event at this venue in San Diego, CA

We Actually Mean It When We Say “Unforgettable Event”

You read it all the time on other websites for other event venues: “we give your guests an experience they’ll never forget!” But is a game of bowling or a private room at a restaurant really that unforgettable or exciting? Nope.

Racing wheel-to-wheel with your coworkers and colleagues at speeds approaching 45mph? Now that’s what we call an unforgettable event.

Infuses Excitement into any Type of Company Event

A company event at our venue is stimulating from the start. As soon as Karen from accounting or Steve from the warehouse straps on his/her helmet, you’re going to see a totally different side to them. Our indoor go kart racing experience is just flat-out fun and is guaranteed to get your guests’ hearts pumping and their mouths smiling.
